Key Features

  • Unique Blend of Green Citrus Notes
  • 24 hours Intensive Protection
  • Blend of Woods Earthy Moss and Vanilla
  • Tempting and Enticing Fragrance

A fragrance for women the Secret Temptation Romance EDP is designed to bring out the temptress within you while keeping you swathed in a cocoon of light essence.

Alluring and innocent

The fragrance manages to capture the contrasting emotions of deep sensual allure with playful innocence to wrap you up in its cosiness.  

Romantic appeal

Presented in a flacon that appeals to the finer senses the fragrance is created to invoke latent amorous intentions.    

24-hour intensive protection

Intense and effective Romance has a sillage that will last through twenty four hours giving you ultimate protection against odour.
A lady is as fine as the fragrance that adorns her and Secret Temptation Romance is an offering to appease the classiest and sultriest of ladies.
